data.author: Yuriy Galanter

changelog.release_notes: - updated all watches to new font
Library refreshers

- fixed PTR artifact during weather update
- added Singapore timezone
- fix for PTR crashing on language change (memory issue)
- added HRM support
- Updated to clearer font for b&w watches
- catching custom Korean language pack to switch to US English
- experimental memory optimization to prevent PTR crash
- updated to latest dependency packages
- added Pebble 2/Diorite support
- Added support for TimeLine QuickView
- fix for crash with long location names

- additional fixes for special characters
- fixed weather disappearing during updaye
- fixed not showing characters in multilanguage support
- fixed triple digit temperature display on PT
- adjusted precision of Time Active display

- added health info: time active, calories burned at rest, calories burned active
- optimized cache for translations

- moved to kiezel package
- moved to newer versions of events and weather packages
- fixed weather update to real 15,30,60
-fixed intermittent hourglass in weather update

data.description:
$0.99 USD

Design and Art Direction by Paul Joel - www.pauljoel.com

CobbleStyle is back! This time with THREE modes to display the time: analog, digital or BIG TIME! With complete customization on what information you want displayed. With pre-designed color sets and complete color customization. Make CobbleStyle 2 how you want it!

Key features:

- Three Ways to display the time: Analog, digital, or BIG TIME!
- Multi-language support
- Anti-aliasing text and graphics.
- Date / Weather / Bluetooth connection.
- GPS Location.
- Week number.
- Local time.
- Alternative timezones.
- AM/PM.
- Seconds counter.
- Pre-designed color sets.
- Custom colors.
- Custom text.
- Backlight when charging option.
- Bluetooth alert options.
- THREE weather providers - choose most reliable for your location
- Master Key weather provider control via https://www.pmkey.xyz - store all your weather API keys in one convenient location

INFO ON API KEYS: http://tinyurl.com/weapi

Health Info:

- Step Count
- Live step goal bar.
- Custom step goal.
- Distance Walked
- Time Active
- Calories burned at rest
- Calories burned while active

After installing CobbleStyle 2 you will have 3 days trial to explore all the features and different aspects. At the end of the trial if you like CobbleStyle 2 and want to keep it, it's just $0.99 via KiezelPay payment system. You will be prompted to enter code and follow easy payment steps. Once purchased, the watchface is yours permanently, no matter what Pebble or phone you use, as long as you keep the same Pebble account.
data.title: CobbleStyle 2
